column1:
Conjugate in the imperfect tense.
gustar
to like (intr.), to please
column2:
gustar
(imperfect tense)
(a mí) me gustaba
(a tí) te gustaba
(a él, ella, Ud.) le gustaba
(a nosotros) nos gustaba
(a vosotros) os gustaba
(a ellos, Uds.) les gustaba
Note that the conjugation of gustar depends on the quantity of what is being liked, not who is doing the liking.
Ex. We liked the book. Nos gustaba el libro.
I liked the books. Me gustaban los libros.
